title: Samsung's The Frame QLED TV crashes to record-low price in epic Black Friday deal
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Samsung's art-inspired Frame TV is $500 off at Amazon's early Black Friday sale
article: Black Friday is one of the best opportunities to score Samsung's stunning The Frame TV, and Amazon is jumping the gun with a fantastic deal that you can shop right now. Samsung's 55-inch Frame QLED TV is on sale for $997.99 (was $1,499.99) at Amazon. That's a massive $500 discount and the lowest price we've seen for the art-inspired QLED TV. Discounts like this are typically reserved for the official Black Friday 2021 sale, but thanks to expected shipping delays, retailers are offering record-low prices earlier than ever.

Samsung's The Frame TV not only delivers a stunning picture with a QLED display, but the stylish set can also transform into a beautiful work of art. The QLED TV features a dedicated Art Mode, allowing you to choose from various picture frame options to display classic artworks or photography. The 2021 Samsung set also features customizable bezels, so you can select a style and color to match your home decor. You're also getting smart capabilities with Amazon Alexa built-in for hands-free control. We don't know how long Amazon will have this Samsung set at this record-low price, so we'd recommend snapping up this incredible deal now before it's too late.
